articles.author: Kaya Burgess
articles.title: Mission seeking life on Jupiter ice moon ‘likely’ to be in vain - The Times
articles.description: Nasa and the European Space Agency’s probes are due to arrive at Europa in 2031-32 to discover if it can support life. A study says it cannot
articles.content: Two space probes are whizzing their way to Europa, an icy moon in orbit around Jupiter, to look for signs of habitability or even alien life. However, a study suggests their search will be in vain an… [+3283 chars]
